title: borovichok
author: borovichok
content: What happened::The was website Amoun.ccÂ  created few months ago without copied site contents are promoting cryptocurrency cloud mining as a means for investors to profit. The 1% to 3% daily returns made by the platform are absurdly high. when it it's too good to be true then it's a lie. The website is obviously a fraud because such returns are plainly unrealistic and unsustainable Scammers Profile Link: Reference Link: https://amoun.cc/#Amount Scammed: $300Payment Method: BTC and others Proof of Payment: N/A Offering Unrealistic profit/No social media page, these links are dummy linkshttps://www.whois.com/whois/amoun.ccI got a report from an old friend about how we lost about &300 on this site, so I looked it up and wooow it was a scam site with a questionable history of defrauding its customers. hope it saves someon,s out Therre
